title: Most popular social network sites in Asian countries in 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of registered users (in millions) for 15 number of Country and Platforms.
The Number of registered users (in millions) is appeared to be the highest at Country and Platform China (QZone) and lowest at Country and Platform Sri Lanka (Facebook).
The highest Country and Platform China (QZone) has 596.4 more Number of registered users (in millions) than the lowest Country and Platform Sri Lanka (Facebook).

The Number of registered users (in millions) is appeared to be the highest at Country and Platform China (QZone) and lowest at Country and Platform Sri Lanka (Facebook).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of registered users (in millions) for 15 number of Country and Platforms.
The Number of registered users (in millions) is appeared to be the highest at Country and Platform China (QZone) and lowest at Country and Platform Sri Lanka (Facebook).

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of registered users (in millions) for 15 number of Country and Platforms.
The maximum Number of registered users (in millions) 598.0 is found at Country and Platform China (QZone) and the minimum is found at Sri Lanka (Facebook) where Country and Platform is 1.6.
Second maximum Number of registered users (in millions) is found at Country and Platform India (Facebook).
The highest Country and Platform China (QZone) has 596.4 more Number of registered users (in millions) than the lowest Country and Platform Sri Lanka (Facebook).

Country and Platform China (QZone) is higher than any other Country and Platforms with value 598.0, followed by India (Facebook), and Indonesia (Facebook). Down to Country and Platform Sri Lanka (Facebook) with the lowest value 1.6.
Country and Platform Taiwan (Facebook), and Malaysia (Facebook) have the same Number of registered users (in millions).
The Country and Platform China (QZone) has 10.32 times more Number of registered users (in millions) than average.
